TEXT.S:
Minsiong Minsiong (Paywan binacadan a kamu: Balai, nalecuhan i 1970 a mihcaan 6 a bulad 9 a demiad). Taywan mudadiway, mipalaway, namakay i Pingtung sian Sici siang Silu niyazu', u Paywan binacadan a tademaw. naayaway a ngangan: ci Lee minsiong. malimula' a ngangan: ci Minsiong ke. kanatal: Conghuaminko. binacadan: Paywan. nalecu i Taywan Pingtung sian Sici siang. nalecuhan i 1970 a mihcaan 6 a bulad 9 a demiad. kawaw niza: mudadiway, mipalaway, mitelungay, misanga' tu dadiw. misanga' tu palaw. matinengay a kamu: Hulam, Paywan, Taywan. pahezek a cacudadan: Pingtung kawkung. nalimaan: kalimucu' sakapitu.
siwkay niza Minsiong i kawcung henay sa, mudadiwtu i Pingtung, Kaosiung. sisa, matinengtu katuuday ku mipalaway a tademaw.
nalimaan nu dadiw pulungan a nalimaan:<mududu' tu bulad >1999 a mihcaan palekal teked a nalimaan:<maazih tu cilal >2001 a mihcaanaci wanposenLincyayiCoyun pulung mudadiw) teked a nalimaan:<sicedamay a luma' >2008 a mihcaan[2][3] - adidi'ay a nalimaan:<Less and More>2012 a mihcaan palekal
iga 2008 a mihcaan <kalimucu' sakapitu>mipalaw ci Malaw 2012 a mihcaan<pakuyucay a tademaw> 2017 a mihcaan<52 Hz I Love You>
tilibi Taywan tilibi2001 a mihcaan- u ngangan aku ci Lianhua Yincumincu tilibi2005 a mihcaan- miadupay Yincumincu tilibi2009 a mihcaan- misaydan i Lanyu Binawlan tilibi2009 a mihcaan- kakasenengan Manamuh tilibi2010 a mihcaan- muwa atu kilang Taywan tilibi2011 a mihcaan- kakasenengan i umah Manamuh tilibi2012 a mihcaan- buyu RXAY Sanli tilibi2013 a mihcaan- maymaw takuwanan Sanli tilibi2014 a mihcaan- limulak tilibi2015 a mihcaan-PMAM Tademaw tilibi2015 a mihcaan-Taywan tilibi2016 a mihcaan- Taywan tilibi2016 a mihcaan- (2016)F
nalimaan nu mitelungay misalukyaw ku Tuas kapah tu Taywan palud ni ina tansul sa singangan tuway nuayaway a simpi cacekulan u zuma ku kapah nu palaw 5~9
